    • recreate

      public void recreate()
      This method creates a new Database deleting, if existing, the one present in the indicated basePath (default is "records/")

      Returns:

      public CityRecord getFavouriteCity()
      Return CityRecord object stored in favourite.json
      Returns:

      public void addHumidity​(java.util.List<HumidityRecord> humidityRecords)

      Parameters:
      humidityRecords - records to store

      Returns:
